title: Im stuck in a feedback loop D:
body: Im stuck in a feedback loop in ranked, i have a mega losing streak like 7 games, then get really low MMR then cos I'm so low, i get a massive winning streak 7-8 games, then get really high MMR and go on en even worse losing streak, then win even more and its an end less feedback loop D: how do i get out of it.

replies.body: I have been through this situation before however it has only been through a 3-4 loss streak before it starts to change in favor of victories. What is the cause of your losing streaks? What's happening throughout your games? What I would suggest is that if you are in a losing streak, how I do it is limit myself from two loses only and I take a break from it and do not continue playing. Players that do not take a break from their lost streak tend to bring that attitude from the last game to the next refreshed game of theirs so it is not a great mood. I also suggest doing a duo q with any of your friends or anyone else to reduce the chances of losing, overall a team game increases the likelihood of winning.
that just means you're where you should be. probably.

Actually i would personally say that his way to dependant on his team if this is the case, this doesn't mean his good or not.

Also he might be talking about normals, i just looked and the account is only level 9.
Im basically 1 for 1 but id rather be 1 for 1 as in win loss win loss win loss, not loss loss loss loss win win win win.
Simply get better. Learn what exactly the people with higher MMR are doing better than you in your games and fix it. Are you constantly out cs'd? do you get ganked more in higher games? etc
Play at the Higher MMR's standard.
